(1) Carry a pepper spray with you, always and keep it handy. Don’t tuck it too low in your bag. 
(2) When you are travelling in an auto alone, make sure you share the auto number with someone in your family even if it’s during the day. 
(3) When in office, avoid going to isolated areas with no CCTV cameras. 
(4) Whenever you are posting anything on social media, make sure you don’t do it in real-time. Because if you do, you’re telling people on your social media about your whereabouts. Delay those posts by say, 20-30 minutes. 
(5) If you feel someone is stalking you, try to find a crowded place and call someone for help. 
(6) When you are walking on a road, keep your mobile phone handy but avoid using it. Being on the phone makes you less alert.
